00040                 if (state == false) state = true;
00041                 else if (state == true) state = false;
00042         }

00045                 return state;
00046         }
00047

00050         }
00051

00053                 return !state;
00054         }

00057                 neighbours.add(cell);
00058         }
00059         
00060         public int getNeighbourCount(){
00061                 int nCount = 0;
00062                 for(Cell neighbour: neighbours){
00063                         if(neighbour.getState()){
00064                                 nCount++;
00065                         }
00066                 }
00067                 return nCount;
00068         }
00069         
00070         public String toString(){
00071                 StringBuffer strBuffer =  new StringBuffer();
00072                 strBuffer.append("Cell: "+ "Position = "+position.toString());
00073                 strBuffer.append(" State = " + (state? "Alive":"Dead"));
00074                 strBuffer.append(" Neighbours = "+neighbours);
00075                 
00076                 return strBuffer.toString();
